title: 按照教程配置好开发环境后运行fabricExampleMod的崩溃问题
author: wangxinmiaoggg
txt_content:
已经按照网上的教程将该设置的东西都设置好了，最后运行的时候还是crash了，但是无奈看不懂崩溃报告，求解决方案，很想自己做一个属于自己的MOD。

`---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// There are four lights!

Time: 2020/2/27 上午1:50
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
        at net.minecraft.client.options.GameOptions.<init>(GameOptions.java:221)

Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Failed to locate library: lwjgl.dll

        ... 11 more
Caused by: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Failed to locate library: lwjgl.dll

        at java.base/jdk.internal.misc.Unsafe.ensureClassInitialized(Unsafe.java:1042)

        at java.base/java.lang.invoke.DirectMethodHandle.ensureInitialized(DirectMethodHandle.java:400)
        at net.minecraft.client.util.InputUtil.<clinit>(InputUtil.java:106)
        ... 11 more


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:

Thread: Render thread
Stacktrace:

replies.author: Karlatemp
replies.txt_content:
从报错上看是navite库没加载上.
你可以去找找你有没有native目录, 你也许可以用HMCL啥的补全一下? 不是mod开发者不太明白怎么补全(抱歉)
或许你可以下lwjgl的native库然后加到classpath里试试
https://www.lwjgl.org/download

Caused by: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: 找不到: lwjgl.dll

replies.author: wangxinmiaoggg
replies.txt_content:
Karlatemp 发表于 2020-2-27 05:47
从报错上看是navite库没加载上.
你可以去找找你有没有native目录, 你也许可以用HMCL啥的补全一下? 不是mod ...
还是没有解决，哭了
